Text.Page:
Looking to make a little extra money on the side today, ?

{@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} will tell you what's on the docket.

I should probably ask one of the Hands to do this, but you're a thousand times more dependable.

Would you mind going to Fyrmount today? If I send one of my own, I may never see them again. They'll either run scared or die painfully.

I can't believe she sent you to {@Rgn:4001#Fyrmount}!

What would've happened if we'd never met you? We'd probably all be dead.

Thank you, . I know I can be a real pain in the ass, but it's not an easy time to be alive. Just ask {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne}.

Elthienne promised a contact of ours that we'd take care of some of the threats in {@Rgn:4001#Fyrmount}, so hunt {@LinkCreature:4#1011#fangspawns} there. Oh, and they want proof of death. I have no idea what that means, so just bring back a toenail or something.

You must be exhausted.

Get payment from {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} and then take a load off somewhere in town. You need your beauty rest, .

Hunt {@LinkCreature:4#1021#sulphurous groknars} in {@Rgn:4001#Fyrmount} and bring back proof of their deaths for Elthienne's contact.

I don't know what they want or why they want it, but I'm sure you'll find something—probably something disgusting.

You know, {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} isn't all that bad. I've probably said some things I shouldn't have.

She's a tough cookie. I think it's hard for two tough cookies to work so closely together. Especialy when one of them is, like, old and crumbling—there I go again! I just can't help myself!

I think she knows we're talking about her. You should go check.

Kill {@LinkCreature:4#2011#voracious fangspawns} in {@Rgn:4001#Fyrmount} and bring back proof of their deaths. Elthienne will need it for the person who hired us. Make sure it's something gruesome and oozing. That was sarcasm, by the way.

You've done it again, !

Here, you earned this.
